Name: Merv Reborn
About the game: Merv is a classical platform game. Adventure through the many different worlds solving puzzles and finding collectables as you go. The difficulty increases the further you go. Key Features Check your performance against other players on the leader-board. Achievable achievements, In a reasonable length of time. Keyboard and Controller support. Fast and smooth scrolling action. Continue from where you left off, Games are automatically synced to the Steam cloud. Try and compete against other to beat their times.
